translation: Arjuna said, "O Krishna, I do not see how this Yoga of equanimity, which you have taught me, can be maintained steadily, due to the restlessness of the mind."
commentary: 6.33 who which? This is this? Yoga: Yoga? By you by Thee? spoken taught? Samyen by eanimity? Madhusoodana O slayer of Madhu? This its? I'm I? Not not? I see see? from restlessness? Status continuance? sthiram steady.Commentary As the mind is restless? impetuous and unsteady I find it difficult to practice this Yoga of eanimity declared by Thee. O my Lord? I cannot have steady concentration? as it wanders here and there in the twinkling of an eye.
